if_elseif_else_conditional.name: If/ElseIf/Else conditional

switch_statement.comment: Expression is compared with cases using the strict === comparator
switch_statement.name: Switch statement

foreach_loop.comment: The for...of loop is intended for arrays and provides the entire element. The for...in loop works on objects and arrays and returns the key, requiring the value to be dereferenced such as object[propertyName]. The array.forEach(...) loop is a functional iterator provided only on arrays.
foreach_loop.name: Foreach loop
